fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, search for new Pokemon.
- Use the ability of any Pokemon you have.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have a 40% chance of finding a Pokemon (Base), 35% chance of finding a Pokemon (Single), 15% chance of finding a Pokemon (Evolved), and 10% chance of finding a Pokemon (Legendary).
- You can use the abilities of any Pokemon you've found.
- If you use a harmful effect on an evil role with an attack, that Pokemon will die in the process.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill anyone that opposes the Town.
